Translations.Text: Naksatrera kasama, yakhana astamita haya.
Tomadera sangi pathabhrasta hanani ebam bipathagami'o hanani.
Ebam prabrttira taranaya katha balena na.
Kora'ana ohi, ya pratyadesa haya.
Tamke siksa dana kare eka saktisali pheresata
sahajata saktisampanna, se nija akrtite prakasa pela.
Urdhba digante
atahpara nikatabarti hala o jhule gela.
Takhana du'i dhanukera byabadhana chila athaba ara'o kama.
Takhana allaha tamra dasera prati ya pratyadesa karabara, ta pratyadesa karalena.
Rasulera antara mithya baleni ya se dekheche.
Tomara ki bisaye bitarka karabe ya se dekheche
niscaya se take arekabara dekhechila
sidaratulamuntahara nikate
yara kache abasthita basabasera jannata.
Yakhana brksati dbara acchanna ha'oyara, taddbara acchanna chila.
Tamra drstibibhrama haya ni ebam simalanghana'o kareni.
Niscaya se tara palanakartara mahana nidarsanabali abalokana kareche.
Tomara ki bhebe dekhecha lata o oyaya samparke.
Ebam trtiya arekati manata samparke
putra-santana ki tomadera jan'ye ebam kan'ya-santana allahara jan'ya
ematabasthaya eta to habe khuba'i asangata bantana.

Egulo katagulo nama bai naya, ya tomara ebam tomadera purba-purusadera rekhecha. Era samarthane allaha kona dalila nayila karenani. Tara anumana ebam prabrttira'i anusarana kare. Athaca tadera kache tadera palanakartara paksa theke patha nirdesa eseche.
Manusa ya caya, ta'i ki paya
ata'eba, parabarti o purbabarti saba mangala'i allahara hate.
Akase aneka pheresata rayeche. Tadera kona suparisa phalaprasu haya na yataksana allaha yara jan'ye iccha o yake pachanda karena, anumati na dena.
Yara parakale bisbasa kare na, tara'i pheresatake naribacaka nama diye thake.
Athaca e bisaye tadera kona jnana ne'i. Tara kebala anumanera upara cale. Athaca satyera byapare anumana mote'i phalaprasu naya.
Ata'eba ye amara smarane bimukha ebam kebala parthiba jibana'i kamana kare tara tarapha theke apani mukha phiriye nina.
Tadera jnanera paridhi e paryanta'i. Niscaya apanara palanakarta bhala janena, ke tamra patha theke bicyuta hayeche ebam tini'i bhala janena ke supathaprapta hayeche.
Nabhomandala o bhumandale ya kichu ache, saba'i allahara, yate tini mandakarmiderake tadera karmera pratiphala dena ebam satkarmiderake dena bhala phala.

Yara bara bara gonaha o aslilakarya theke bemce thake chotakhata aparadha karale'o niscaya apanara palanakartara ksama sudura bistrta. Tini tomadera samparke bhala janena, yakhana tini tomaderake srsti karechena mrttika theke ebam yakhana tomara matrgarbhe kaci sisu chile. Ata'eba tomara atnaprasansa karo na. Tini bhala janena ke sanyami.
Apani ki take dekhechena, ye mukha phiriye neya.
Ebam deya saman'ya'i o pasana haye yaya.
Tara kache ki adrsyera jnana ache ye, se dekhe
take ki janano hayani ya ache musara kitabe
ebam ibrahimera kitabe, ye tara dayitba palana karechila
kitabe e'i ache ye, kona byakti kara'o gonaha nije bahana karabe na.
Ebam manusa ta'i paya, ya se kare
tara karma sighra'i dekha habe.
Atahpara take purna pratidana deya habe.
Tomara palanakartara kache sabakichura samapti
ebam tini'i hasana o kamdana
ebam tini'i marena o bamcana
ebam tini'i srsti karena yugala-purusa o nari.
Ekabindu birya theke yakhana skhalita kara haya.
Punarut'thanera dayitba tamra'i
ebam tini'i dhanabana karena o sampada dana karena.
Tini sira naksatrera malika.
Tini'i prathama ada sampradayake dhbansa karechena
ebam samudake'o; atahpara ka'uke abyahati denani.
Ebam tadera purbe nuhera sampradayake, tara chila ara'o jalema o abadhya.
Tini'i janapadake sun'ye uttolana kare niksepa karechena.
Atahpara take acchanna kare neya ya acchanna karara.
Atahpara tumi tomara palanakartara kona anugrahake mithya balabe
Atitera satarkakaridera madhye se-o ekajana satarkakari.
Keyamata nikate ese geche.
Allaha byatita ke'u eke prakasa karate saksama naya.
Tomara ki e'i bisaye ascaryabodha karacha
ebam hasacha-krandana karacha na
tomara krira-kautuka karacha
ata'eba allahake sejada kara ebam tamra ebadata kara.
